Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-42363 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.36.1-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-42363 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.36.1-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package busybox is earlier than 1.36.1-7, affected by CVE-2023-42363
